items: Earned certification in Doxis CSB, gaining hands‑on exposure to enterprise content management (ECM) systems and intelligent document processing.
Collaborated with engineering teams on designing Agentic AI workflows, and completed 4 global certifications related to DOXIS CSB ECM architecture and integration.
Developed an NLP‑based ticket classification system that reduced support team response time by 30% using LSTM models and GloVe embeddings.
Conducted geospatial analysis of traffic and accident data to identify high‑risk zones, enabling better resource allocation and public safety measures.

achievements.title: LeetCode DSA Practice
items: Solved 300+ problems covering arrays, trees, graphs, and dynamic programming on LeetCode.

achievements.title: DataWars Data Preprocessing Projects
items: Completed 50+ projects involving data cleaning, transformation, and feature engineering.

achievements.title: Production Head – Stage Plays
items: Led stage and logistics for award‑winning theatre productions at IIT Madras & NIT Trichy (Saarang 2nd, Festember 1st).
Received special recognition for production management and coordination.

projects.title: Agentic Job Application using AI
features: Engineered an AI‑driven agent that automates job‑application workflows, integrating NLP and API orchestration to personalize resumes and cover letters for 200+ job postings daily.
Designed and deployed a scalable microservice architecture in Python/Flask, leveraging transformer models (e.g., BERT) for resume parsing and job‑description matching, reducing manual effort by 75%.
Conducted rigorous A/B testing and performance analytics to optimize candidate success rates, achieving a 30% increase in interview invitations within the first month of deployment.

projects.title: Agentic Chatbot using LangGraph
features: Designed and deployed an agentic chatbot using LangGraph and LangChain, integrating real‑time web scraping to provide contextually relevant LLM responses in a dynamic UI.
Built a modular, node‑based workflow with reusable tools and state management, boosting feature‑extraction efficiency by 50% and ensuring seamless extensibility of the chatbot service layer.
Streamlined inference pipelines and launched a Streamlit interface, reducing response latency by 30% and enhancing beta‑test user satisfaction.

projects.title: Agentic Web‑Enabled Conversational AI
features: Engineered an autonomous conversational system that uses LLMs to dynamically retrieve and synthesize real‑time web data.
Orchestrated Planner, Search, and Synthesizer agents using MCP protocol; enabled contextual continuity with ChromaDB and SerpAPI.
